summary: Provides GPU-accelerated implementations of region-based measurement operations for n‑dimensional image data, including connected‑component labeling and statistical reductions (mean, sum, variance, standard deviation) over labeled regions, built on custom CUDA kernels.
business_intent: Enable high‑performance image analysis on NVIDIA GPUs by offering CuPy equivalents of SciPy ndimage measurement functions, allowing fast computation of region statistics in scientific and computer‑vision applications.
